Schneider-Blum2007 Table 29

Schneider-Blum2007 Tables 48-53. There is both a simple and a double causative (caus,causD),each with two overlapping allomorphs,as follows:caus1 –s-,causD1 –siis-,caus2 –siis-,causD2 –siisiis-. The paradigm gives the occurrence of these allomorphs in correlation with the stem-final consonant..
